BriefDescription: TMA slots available for an unhalted hart. In case of SMT the counts are distributed cycles between all active harts in the same physical core.
PublicDescription: TMA slots available for an unhalted hart. In case of SMT the counts are distributed cycles between all active harts in the same physical core.

BriefDescription: TMA slots unused due to the frontend did not supply enough operations
PublicDescription: TMA slots unused due to the frontend did not supply enough operations

BriefDescription: TMA slots wasted due to incorrect speculations.
PublicDescription: TMA slots wasted due to incorrect speculations. This include slots used to issue uops that do not eventually get retired and slots for which the issue-pipeline was blocked due to recovery from earlier incorrect speculation. For example; wasted slots due to miss-predicted branches should be accounted by this event. Incorrect data speculation followed by Memory Ordering Nukes is another example.

BriefDescription: TMA slots wasted due to incorrect control flow speculations.
PublicDescription: TMA slots wasted due to incorrect control flow speculations.

BriefDescription: TMA slots wasted due to memory ordering violations.
PublicDescription: TMA slots wasted due to memory ordering violations.

BriefDescription: TMA slots unused due to the lack of backend resources
PublicDescription: TMA slots unused due to the lack of backend resources

BriefDescription: TMA slots unused due to the stalls caused by load and store instructions
PublicDescription: TMA slots unused due to the stalls caused by load and store instructions

BriefDescription: TMA slots unused due to the non-memory stalls
PublicDescription: TMA slots unused due to the non-memory stalls

BriefDescription: Number of slots wasted due to serializing operations like fence or csr accesses
PublicDescription: Number of slots wasted due to serializing operations like fence or csr accesses

BriefDescription: TMA slots wasted while waiting for address generation and translation
PublicDescription: TMA slots wasted while waiting for address generation and translation

BriefDescription: TMA slots wasted while waiting for address translation which missed L1 TLB
PublicDescription: TMA slots wasted while waiting for address translation which missed L1 TLB

BriefDescription: TMA slots wasted while waiting for address translation which missed L2 TLB
PublicDescription: TMA slots wasted while waiting for address translation which missed L2 TLB

BriefDescription: TMA slots wasted while waiting for data
PublicDescription: TMA slots wasted while waiting for data

BriefDescription: TMA slots unused due to the stalls caused by memory instructions which missed L1 data cache
PublicDescription: TMA slots unused due to the stalls caused by memory instructions which missed L1 data cache

BriefDescription: TMA slots unused due to the stalls caused by memory instructions which missed L2 cache
PublicDescription: TMA slots unused due to the stalls caused by memory instructions which missed L2 cache

BriefDescription: TMA slots unused due to the stalls caused by memory instructions which missed L3 cache
PublicDescription: TMA slots unused due to the stalls caused by memory instructions which missed L3 cache
